website_summaries.verdict: The price and appearance are big pluses for this rocker switch, but some users dislike its mechanics.
cons: Noticeably loud clicking noise during use
Switch feels stiffer  than similar products

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - But
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality switches but I am having a lot of problems with actual colors. Lutron has a satin line and a gloss line. This one is satin and that is what I wanted but it is barely even noticeable as a shade of silver or gray. The other gray they sell is much more gray but it is the glossy finish. It is still not dark enough gray to stand out. Be careful in ordering these. Make sure you investigate which colors are satin and which are gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love these light switches. They look modern and are very easy to use. My husband felt they are easy to trade out for the old regular switches. I have these turquoise in the bathroom, purple in bedroom, red in closet and silver in the kitchen. We will be changing out all of our switches and electric outlets when we paint our walls. No sure why some colors cost more than others?
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful and classy. They take a necessary product that has looked the same (gross & ugly) for decades and makes it as beautiful and classy as the other features of your home. I spent months and a lot of money getting just the right color and paint treatment on my walls and I couldn’t stand putting standard those nasty gross beige switch plates on my walls. Such a nice change. I only wish I could get more options.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good, standard light switch at a reasonable price, buy something else. This works well enough, but has a loud, stiff action. I kept the one I ordered because it was for a garbage disposal, which makes a racket of its own, anyway. If you only need to control lights, there are better and less expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Napa Jack

customer_reviews.title: Price is astronomical! Shop around...
customer_reviews.text: If you want a crazy color, you'll have to pay for it, otherwise no SPST (2-way) switch should be over $3. If you are ok with White, Black, Ivory, Brown, Gray or Almond, get this Legrand switch instead:
customer_reviews.author: Sj773Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Sienna color to match copper hardware
customer_reviews.text: This niche color switch I bought to go with a bathroom with copper hardware and this copper plate. Went back and forth as to whether to get bronze instead. But I like this. The color is bold and not for everyone's tastes. Is matte and not high gloss so will not show fingerprints
customer_reviews.author: ValryianSteel

customer_reviews.title: Would buy 10 pack of levitons instead.
customer_reviews.text: After buying one of these, I bought two 10 packs of leviton light almond decora switches. They feel the same quality, and the levitons are far cheaper. The only real difference is that the lutrons have slightly narrower buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Illuminating
customer_reviews.text: It's a light switch, easy to install as any other. Deducted a star since it's quite a bit chunkier than similar styled switches from other brands so was a little harder to get everything back in the box nicely. Also it doesn't come with the trim piece which I didn't realize, fortunately it's close enough to a spare light almond one I have from another project that it's not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: T.F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but expensive
customer_reviews.text: The Lutron switch lines are good quality items no better or worse than other much less expensive brands. The selling point is the many designer colors these cone in. If color isn't your criteria, then buy another much less expensive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Norma MArrin

customer_reviews.title: Switch was faulty, but replaced quickly
customer_reviews.text: I received a faulty switch which was very disappointing considering i ordered this specifically for the color. I will be returning: follow up. Amazon sent me a new switch super fast and I was able to get up and running right away. The new one worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sherman

customer_reviews.title: The color looks very nice with my backsplash tile
customer_reviews.text: The color looks very nice with my backsplash tile. Note that the taupe color is slightly darker than the stone color option. The colors shown look the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: L Warnecke

customer_reviews.title: Matches unique switch plates (see pic)
customer_reviews.text: We changed the switch to brown to match my daughter’s horse theme bedroom. The white switch just didn’t look right .
customer_reviews.author: MommypunkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Missing the metal plates for screwing down the wire!
customer_reviews.text: This switch looks really cool for my game room, happy with the color. The weird thing is, it doesn't have the metal plates that clamp down on the wire when you tighten the screw! All my other switches have it, so I just broke one off another switch and used it on this one, which did work. But it's super strange why it doesn't have the loose metal plates that all the other switches have.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Maniloff

customer_reviews.title: expensive but the best light switch
customer_reviews.text: I use nothing but Lutron electrical products in my remodeling. They are the best and will last a long time. Many colors also
customer_reviews.author: robbie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great - Installed Easy - Don't Forget To Purchase Matching Cover
customer_reviews.text: This literally what you expected when you purchased it. No surprises. But it if you want a grey outlet haha. Don't forget to purchase the cover for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lutron has good quality! Component colors match very well.
customer_reviews.text: Installed with a desert Stone wall plate. Colors match perfect. I actually worked at the facility where many of the Lutron parts are made, and I know that there is a lot of effort put into making sure that all the colors match.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The switch feels very nice to actuate
customer_reviews.text: I'm now a Lutron fan. I have this along with a Lutron occupancy sensor with the wall plate. The switch feels very nice to actuate. Lutron offers these switches in a variety of colors, which gives you a lot of style options.
customer_reviews.author: PCTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great color...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered many of all the matching components for a remodel....they all match in the hard to find taupe!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Mundell

customer_reviews.title: overpriced but great for matching decor
customer_reviews.text: We bought many many coordinated rooms with colors. PRICEY for just a wall switch or outlet
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL MACDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Been working perfectly for about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. Programmed pretty easy and works fine. Using with 4 LED outdoor lamps. Probably about 50W total.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Schings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It looks expensive and was super easy to install. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: I only use Lutron.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Luton for all my switches and outlets in my home for 46 years. They are dependable and have a good selection for decor jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Anon-ymous

customer_reviews.title: Lutron has rocker switches which are beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Lutron has rocker switches which are beautiful and elegant. They are plastic not medal but beautifully designed and fit right into my new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Lutron. High quality paddle switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Lutron. High quality paddle switch to pair with a screwless plate to spiff up a room.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyG

customer_reviews.title: Faulty switch
customer_reviews.text: While installing 2 of the three switches broke in the same location. After the first one broke i was being extra careful and even with all of the care it still broke, it breaks at the bottom of the switch allowing for the switch to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Langley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Matches the paint in my living (used for paint matching). Nice
customer_reviews.author: MrD-Big AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Switch. Bought this to control the garbage disposal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Switch. Bought this to control the garbage disposal in the kitchen. Switch works well turning off and on. Bought to match other dimmer & timer switches from Lutron. The screw-less bezel gives these switches a very modern cool look. I Will continue to buy more to replace other switches in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy, and modern way to upgrade those old toggle switches.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Need to get correct item (as what's labled in box & in the order!)
customer_reviews.text: The actual priduct is great! However, this us the secind time ive had this order shipoed to my house, and it's becuase it keeps coming in"white" & not the Light Almond I've orderd. The outside of the box says light almond, but the actual switch inside is white. Arrgghhhh!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. These switches are a little pricey but worth it in the long run
customer_reviews.author: J.Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: I like this kind of switch
customer_reviews.text: I like this kind of switch. A tap on it is so much nicer than a toggle switch. Easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Delmar Guidinger

customer_reviews.title: hard to install
customer_reviews.text: hard to install. the size of the item I think is bigger than the original. But the style is ok
customer_reviews.author: jojhk

customer_reviews.title: A well made Rocker Switch device. Appearance is more ...
customer_reviews.text: A well made Rocker Switch device. Appearance is more upscale that conventional switches. Comes in a variety of colors to match any decor. Consumers should get the matching color cover plates.
customer_reviews.author: William Pickelsimer

customer_reviews.title: Where's the locator light?
customer_reviews.text: I've had many illuminated switches over the years. The Leviton rocker switches emit a soft glow. The illumination on this was called a "locator light", which I thought peculiar. Upon hooking it up, without the wallplate in place, I do see something glowing behind the rocker. The only problem is that with the wallplate in place, the locator light is not visible even in a completely dark room. I suppose that their intention was to be more subtle than a glowing switch and still provide lighted guidance to the swtich. Unfortunately, the concept does not work. I've purchased 5 of these and they all look lovely. But their locator light is lost on me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brian Lamm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Them!! Replaced our old outlets/switches in the kitchen since the walls are tile and these match perfectly. Looks so much more finished and the color is great.
customer_reviews.author: Creations by Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as described! Fast and FREE shipping with Amazon Prime!!!!
customer_reviews.author: frit

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works. Replace a far more complicated adjustable Lutron switch which was a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Ha1r

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product allowed me to add the spa like touch to our renovated bath without going overboard. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered six of these and am very happy, they look good and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: solid switch with excellent action. Very stiff and solid
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, solid switch with excellent action. Very stiff and solid, feels like quality. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Croy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but had to return as it wasn't the correct item for my needs
customer_reviews.author: GrammaCookieto6

customer_reviews.title: Simple.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install. I like the satisfying click on click off.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing bad to say about the Lutron products. The quality is very good, and it's very well built. 100% worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: MARCELO O JULIAO

customer_reviews.title: beware of color
customer_reviews.text: Switch is fine, works like a charm... Lutron's "stone" color is tan instead of gray. So beware of the pic.
customer_reviews.author: cfbmone

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful switches!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, beautiful and so much nicer when the switch blends into the wall. as opposed to sticking out like a sore thumb!
customer_reviews.author: J. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a very hard "click" sound to it, and feels cheap. Certainly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J. Stake

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and works perfectly. Had to get brown to match other switches in den from the 70s.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Form & Function
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, fits with other Lutron designs and very happy. Nice white look, easy to install and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: LED bulb friendly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of this Lutron switch to replace the ones that came with the house. Previous attempts have been made to purchase nicer and fancier Lutrons that is dimmer capable, but they will not work with LED bulbs. While this one does not dim and will not give that nice slow startup, it will work with any type bulb you throw its way. I am quite happy with them and they went on quickly. Will probably buy 6 more in the future as I will be returning some of the other Lutron switches that will not work with LED and CFL type bulbs. *IF YOU WANT ILLUMINATED SWITCH* try looking at Leviton. They have one and are less expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: Niki R.

customer_reviews.title: Great never leave the light on
customer_reviews.text: Great product bought a few to put in bathrooms and closet. Simple and does the job!! Installation takes about 15 minutes check YouTube if you have trouble installing!
customer_reviews.author: Home DIYer

customer_reviews.title: 4 of 5
customer_reviews.text: Slightly more robust than others so protrudes from wall a bit making it difficult to find a proper cover. Otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: manderson

customer_reviews.title: Switch Plates and outlets disappear into paint color and do not stand out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the switched, receptacle, and plates for our laundry room. The color (desert stone) works well with a light neutral tan/pecan/wheat color. Speckles are not that obvious in person. Easy enough to install. If you like to have your switch plates, etc. disappear into the wall and paint color, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!!  Excellent product from Lutron.  Imported this to South Africa and a first here.  All love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream!! Excellent product from Lutron. Imported this to South Africa and a first here. All love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kemp Maree

customer_reviews.title: TRIED AND TRUE
customer_reviews.text: Quality and price makes any renovation using Lutron switches and recepticals worth doing and would not only buy this product again but also recommend it to others considering home renovation that requires modern deco colours provided by Luton
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Lane

customer_reviews.title: kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.text: perfect color and easy installation for our kitchen remodel. well worth the cost for the look! would recommend this to all
customer_reviews.author: thomas e lopez

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is really the perfect color and has a modern design. It is very easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Light Switch
customer_reviews.text: I love the color most of all. It works fine. Your service was great. Would be happy to purchase any product from you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Disposal or Light ?!
customer_reviews.text: We use these to differentiate between the light switch and the garbage disposal in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Should of been 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this switch and it fell apart as i installed the thing. I was not happy but they rushed me a replacement. The replacement works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful switch
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction. This series comes in a range of colors. It's close enough to my wall cover to blend right; much less noticeable than the standard off-white. Expensive but if you don't need too many it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't glow when off
customer_reviews.text: Switch works, but it doesn't glow as described. I received a replacement and it also doesn't glow, so it's not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match manufacturer's own color sample
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this, I had Lutron send me a set of color samples so I could pick a color that would match our bathroom tile. The "Desert Stone" color sample was a perfect match, so I ordered this and several other items in that color. They just arrived today -- and they DO NOT MATCH Lutron's color sample, not even close. Be warned, you're taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: milmac

customer_reviews.title: Light Switch
customer_reviews.text: Paying a premium for the color switch if it were 20 to 30% more but This is about 200% more then a white one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald mcvicker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This deal was too good to be true. It arrived broken, I'll be unable to use it and I'll have to purhcase a new one in its place. So much for the good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Goldofsky

customer_reviews.title: Great looking switch that performs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It works well, has good connection points, and I really like the wall plates it is designed for. It is hard to write a review for something as simple as a wall switch, but this one performs its job without issue and looks great doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Setesh

customer_reviews.title: Warning - No night light (soft glow) as described - just a switch
customer_reviews.text: Description says: A soft locater light glows in the off position, making the switch easy to find in the dark. NOT ON THIS MODEL!! Contacted Lutron Customer Support and they informed me I would have to order model SC-1PS-NL (not SG). Wanted to use in a guest bathroom. It's a nice switch (would buy again) but seeing the two holes and knowing there should be a small bulbs there. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Molly B

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for matching a color scheme
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to say about a switch. It works. Bought it because I needed a gray switch to match a color scheme and the big box stores didn't have much of a selection.
customer_reviews.author: Spearfishman

customer_reviews.title: Current color
customer_reviews.text: Great product for what I needed! Matching color, works great!
customer_reviews.author: drumman

product_meta.title: Lutron Claro On/Off Switch, 15-Amp, Single-Pole, CA-1PS-BL, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack| Color:BlackLooking to add a little sophistication to your home? Lutron Diva Switches are a perfect replacement for your existing designer opening switches. The large paddle turns the light or fan on and off with just a push of your finger, making it easy to use for people of all ages. Pair with a Lutron Diva Dimmer for control of the lights or a Lutron Diva Fan Control to increase your comfort level. This switch works in single pole applications, where the light or fan is controlled from one switch. These switches are available in 7 gloss colors, allowing you to coordinate and customize specifically for each room in your home.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Diva from Lutron is a simple and elegant solution designed to match your existing designer opening switches and accessories. This Single-Pole switch allows you to easily turn the lights on and off with a rocker-style switch. For use in applications where you'd like to turn your lights on or off from one location. You can complete the look of your home with Claro screwless wallplates, as well as coordinating switches, receptacles, and other accessories. Available in 7 Gloss and 20 Satin colors.
feature_bullets: Features a large rocker paddle that turns the light or fan on/off
For use in single-pole applications where a light or fan is controlled from one switch
Installs in as little as 15 minutes
Includes (1) Claro Switch; coordinating wallplate sold separately
